Entries.Demetrius: I haven't seen {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MaruName}} in hours... I hope she's alright.
Entries.Lewis: Good evening, @. Have you ventured into the haunted maze yet? It's quite spooky.#$e#That strange {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Man:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardGender}}}} who lives in the tower set it all up {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Him:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardGender}}}}self. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardGender}}}} wouldn't let anyone near while {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardGender}}}} was working on it.
Entries.Evelyn: I wish {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GusName}} would include a vegetarian option. Some zucchinni skewers, maybe?
Entries.Jodi: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/VincentName}}'s upset that I won't let {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Him:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/VincentGender}}}} go into the haunted maze... but {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/VincentGender}}}}'s just a little {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Boy:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/VincentGender}}}}!
Entries.Jas: But Aunt {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MarnieName}}! I wanna go in the maze! I'm not scared!$s
